properties.description: GitHub Actions is a CI/CD platform that automates workflows directly within GitHub repositories.
properties.creator: GitHub

properties.description: Travis CI is a cloud-based CI/CD service for building and testing software projects hosted on GitHub.
properties.creator: Travis CI

properties.description: CircleCI is a continuous integration and delivery platform that automates software builds and testing.
properties.creator: CircleCI

properties.description: Code Climate provides automated code review for maintainability, complexity, duplication, and security.
properties.creator: Code Climate

properties.description: SonarCloud provides cloud-based code analysis and security scanning for maintainability and vulnerabilities.
properties.creator: SonarSource
properties.version_supported: Cloud-hosted and integration with multiple platforms

properties.description: Snyk is a security tool that helps developers find and fix vulnerabilities in dependencies.
properties.creator: Snyk Ltd.
properties.version_supported: Cloud-hosted with integrations for GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket

properties.description: Dependabot helps keep dependencies up-to-date by automating pull requests for dependency updates.
properties.creator: GitHub

properties.description: Netlify provides cloud hosting for front-end applications with continuous deployment and integration.
properties.creator: Netlify
properties.version_supported: Cloud-hosted with support for GitHub repositories

properties.description: Vercel provides cloud deployment for web applications with integrations for frameworks like Next.js.
properties.creator: Vercel
properties.version_supported: Cloud-hosted with support for GitHub repositories

properties.description: ReadTheDocs hosts documentation generated from source code with automatic updates from repositories.
properties.creator: Read the Docs

properties.description: Datadog provides cloud monitoring and observability for applications and infrastructure.
properties.creator: Datadog
properties.version_supported: Cloud-hosted with integrations for cloud platforms and repositories

properties.description: New Relic provides application performance monitoring and observability for distributed systems.
properties.creator: New Relic
properties.version_supported: Cloud-hosted with integrations for multiple platforms

properties.description: Sentry is a cloud-based error tracking tool that helps developers monitor and fix crashes in real time.
properties.creator: Sentry

properties.description: Jira is a cloud-based issue tracking and project management tool used by software teams.
properties.creator: Atlassian

properties.description: Docker Hub is a cloud-based registry that allows users to store and distribute container images.
properties.creator: Docker
